descript.abstract: Tax Parcel Boundaries for Baldwin County, Alabama.
descript.purpose: This dataset was developed to help show ownership and more easily display taxation based on parcels in Baldwin County.

idinfo.accconst: According to Baldwin County Disclaimer. Data are licensed for Princeton University-affiliated persons only.
idinfo.useconst: The information contained in the digital data distributed by the Baldwin County Commission is derived from a variety of public and private sources considered to be dependable, but the accuracy, completeness, currency, thereof are not guaranteed. The Baldwin County Commission makes no warranties, expressed or implied, as to the accuracy, completeness, currency, reliability, or suitability for any particular purpose of information or data contained in or generated from the county geographic database. Additionally, the Baldwin County Commission or any agent, servant, or employee thereof assume no liability associated with the use of the data and assume no responsibility to maintain it in any matter or form.

cntorgp.cntorg: Map and Geospatial Information Center, Lewis Library, Princeton University

cntaddr.address: Map and Geospatial Information Center, Lewis Library, Princeton University

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.0 (Build 6001) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.2.0.3348

dataqual.complete: Digital maps are created from MYLAR maps. These maps were digitized by Southern Digital Mapping Inc. and delivered to Baldwin County in May 2000. Subsequent updates are done daily and are based on the changed deeds or new deeds and subdivision plats. The maps existed in ArcInfo Librarian were imported into ArcSDE. Maps were double precisioned in Librarian.

procstep.procdesc: The data set is created from MYLAR maps. These maps were digitized by Southern Digital Mapping Inc. and delivered to Baldwin County

mapproj.mapprojn: NAD 1983 StatePlane Alabama West FIPS 0102 Feet

metainfo.metuc: The information contained in the digital data distributed by the Baldwin County Commission is derived from a variety of public and private sources considered to be dependable, but the accuracy, completeness, currency, thereof are not guaranteed. The Baldwin County Commission makes no warranties, expressed or implied, as to the accuracy, completeness, currency, reliability, or suitability for any particular purpose of information or data contained in or generated from the county geographic database. Additionally, the Baldwin County Commission or any agent, servant, or employee thereof assume no liability associated with the use of the data and assume no responsibility to maintain it in any matter or form.
